Alejandro G. Iñárritu is back with his next feature, BARDO, FALSE CHRONICLE OF A HANDFUL OF TRUTHS.

The film, starring Daniel Giménez Cacho and Griselda Siciliani, is a nostalgic comedy set against an epic personal journey, shot in Iñárritu’s hometown of Mexico City.
